message: Let's start fair. I'll take the lion's share, but you get a decent amount to get us going.
Alice, your offer was heavily skewed in your favor. Let's be realistic - my turn to propose a fairer split that reflects the time pressure on you.
Okay, I see your point. Let's split this closer to the middle.  This offer is more fair, and we can get this done.
Alice, we're running out of time and your offer still heavily favors you despite the inflation working against you.  This is my final offer, take it or leave it.
